resources.string:
To use, in any application, select some text (press and hold), then select Share and choose Smart Share to Calendar to automatically create a calendar event.
Depending on your calendar application, a screen will be shown asking you to confirm the event to be added - and allowing you to change some event specific options. With many applications selecting text is not required, e.g K9 mail, you can just share the entire email and Smart Share to Calendar will figure out the important details.
The app uses Natty and Antlr
